name: Al Mughi
description: Al Mughi is one of the names of Allah in Islam, which translates to 'The Inflictor of Help' or 'The One Who Grants Victory'.
summary: The name Al Mughi signifies Allah's attribute of providing support and assistance to those in need. It represents the divine capacity to offer help during times of struggle, guiding believers towards triumph over adversity. The origin of this name is rooted in Islamic teachings and is mentioned in various sources, emphasizing Allah's role as a protector and helper.
